scripts.build: pnpm run prebuild:guard && node -e "const {execSync}=require('node:child_process'); const run=c=>execSync(c,{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); run('pnpm exec tsx scripts/assert-env.ts'); run('prisma generate'); const allowOnVercel=process.env.ALLOW_MIGRATE_ON_VERCEL==='1'; if (process.env.RUN_MIGRATIONS==='1' && (!process.env.VERCEL || allowOnVercel)) { try { run('prisma migrate deploy'); console.log('[migrate] prisma migrate deploy: OK'); } catch (err) { const message=err&&err.message?err.message:String(err); console.warn('[migrate] deploy failed:', message); if (process.env.VERCEL_ENV==='preview') { console.warn('[migrate] fallback to prisma db push (preview only)'); run('prisma db push --accept-data-loss'); console.log('[migrate] prisma db push: OK'); } else { throw err; } } } else { console.log('[migrate] skipped (RUN_MIGRATIONS=%s, VERCEL=%s, ALLOW_MIGRATE_ON_VERCEL=%s)', process.env.RUN_MIGRATIONS, process.env.VERCEL, process.env.ALLOW_MIGRATE_ON_VERCEL); } run('next build');"
scripts.postinstall: echo skip prisma generate on postinstall
scripts.db:bootstrap: pnpm run db:deploy || pnpm run db:push
